title: Anne-Marie Slaughter - Wikipedia
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter (born September 27, 1958) is an American lawyer and political scientist, and author. She is the current president and CEO of New America (formerly the New America Foundation). Previously, Slaughter served as the dean of Princeton School of Public and International Affairs ...
